title: Drawing, Design for Mahogany Writing Table with Conical Feet, April 21, 1905
title_raw: Design for Mahogany Writing Table with Conical Feet
markings: Stamped in blue ink, upper right corner: APR 21 1905 and at lower center, upside down: NOV 30 1904 [?]
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, above, center, and right of design: Send to NY store ["NY store" crossed out] / from Boston Stock / Mrs. R. Eldridge / NY order 18456; below design, lower center: MAHOGANY WRITING TABLE; lower left corner: /=/EV [underlined]; upper left and center right of design, numerical notations indicating dimensions; center left, with arrow pointing to central table panel: CARVED.
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Rectangular table top with backsplash and carved central panel flanked by 2 drawers; raised on 4 straight tapering legs ending in conical feet.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Mahogany Writing Table with Conical Feet, April 21, 1905. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-235.
